attributes.action: to reinstate the Death Penalty for murderers of Babies and Children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In light of the recent murder of Baby P and other cases of child murder/peadophillia/serious child neglect, we the undersigned request that the Death Penalty be reinstated for the cases proven beyond reasonable doubt.
This is in hope that it will act as a positive deterent and cases like this will be a thing of the past.

rejection.details:
There are several petition already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/allowchilddeath/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
